title: Man hacked to death in Slave Island
body_lines: A person has reportedly been hacked to death with a sharp weapon at Dawson Street in Slave Island, Colombo 02.
The incident had occurred late last night (16) while the victim has been identified as a 50-year-old by the name of Mohamed Siyabdeen, a resident of Slave Island.
Police said preliminary inquiries have revealed that the murder had been carried out over a personal dispute.
